name: Crypt (Taylor P.)
description:
--Crypt-- 

You are an explorer, archeologist of the stars on a mission to uncover what hides beneath. Your team has uncovered the newest dig site -one that is clearly expecting visitors. Indiana Jones and Aperture Inc. have found their long lost friend in this Crypt. Can you find the treasure and escape?

Controls:

WASD

Mouse Click to Grab things in range ("eye" will change green)

Some objects activate others - can you find them all and escape?
